TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Malepa, title = Malepa, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malepa} }

S.FORM: Malepa Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantou ko Malepa a niyaro', 200 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 645 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 625 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 20 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 93%, Seediq 2%, Bunun 1%, Amis 1%.

Malepa Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantoo ko Malepa a niyaro', 200 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 645 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 625 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 20 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 93%, Seediq 2%, Bonon 1%, Amis 1%.
